title: Twitter ends its ban on covid misinformation
description: The rollback of Twitter’s covid misinformation policy is just the latest pivot since Elon Musk took control of the company a month ago.

title: In new trailer, the Mario franchise’s supporting cast takes center stage
description: The trailer revealed just how involved Peach would be in Nintendo’s new movie, all but ensuring her place as more than just a princess in another castle.

title: The busy person’s guide to saving money on holiday shopping
description: If you don’t have hours to spend coupon hunting, here are manageable online shopping tips to save money, time and sanity this holiday season.

title: We all use phones on the toilet. Just don’t sit more than 10 minutes.
description: Phones and devices like the Nintendo Switch and Steam Deck have turned porcelain thrones into fortresses of solitude. But there are risks to sitting too long.

title: China to launch crew to its recently completed space station
description: China has big ambitions in space that rival those of the United States.

title: Martin Scorsese fans dub ‘Goncharov’ the best mafia film (n)ever made
description: There are posters, scripts and music for a 1973 film by Martin Scorsese — but none of it is real.
